ruleContent.content: do{ t=Date();t1=Number(t.charAt(17));t2=Number(t.charAt(19));t3=Number(t.charAt(20));t4=Number(t.charAt(22));t5=Number(t.charAt(23)); //var t=new Date(); //year=t.getFullYear(); //java.log("🍊"+year); n=(t2+t4)%6*1000+t1*100+t3*10+t5; r=java.ajax("http://m.wufazhuce.com/article/"+n.toString()); java.setContent(r); } while(r.includes("404 Not Found")); //获取4个随机数其中第一个数小于6，大概大于5919无内容，并访问网址 chapter.title=java.getString('class.text-title@text'); chapter.url="http://m.wufazhuce.com/article/"+n.toString(); //传出标题 s=String(java.getString('class.text-content@html')); //获取正文内容 if(s.includes("]*src\=\"([^"]+?)(\?imageView[^"]+)?\"[^>]*>/g,'')} //判断正文是否有图片并处理 else if(s.includes("")){s=s.replace(//,"")} if(source.getVariable()<=0||source.getVariable()=="NaN"||book.variable==null){ book.variable=""; source.setVariable(39); } else{ source.setVariable(source.getVariable()-1); } book.variable+="\n★"+chapter.title+"\n"+s; book.variable;

loginUrl:
<js>
  function login() {
  	 const user = String(source.getLoginInfoMap().get("账号"))
    const pw = String(source.getLoginInfoMap().get("密码"))
    let sign = java.md5Encode(`isDevice=Android&password=${pw}&phone=${user}&regDevice=2&key=87ac02d392a8d3566fe7748c8de00af3&secrect=57dcuidu8aa8062bfe8042ea65310669`).toString().toUpperCase()
    let data = JSON.stringify({
      isDevice: "Android",
      password: pw,
      phone: user,
      regDevice: "2",
      sign: sign
    })
    let op = JSON.stringify({
      method: "POST",
      body: data
    })
    let res = java.ajax(`https://api.shaoniandream.com/Login/login,${op}`)
    let $ = JSON.parse(res)
    if($.status != 1) java.toast($.msg)
    java.put("uid",$.data.id)
    source.putLoginHeader(JSON.stringify({
      logintoken: $.data.logintoken
    }))
  	}
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
  let $ = JSON.parse(result)
  let uid = java.get("uid") != "undefined" ? java.get("uid") : "-1"
  let array = []
  $.data.chapterList.forEach((booklet) => {
    array.push({
    	 name: booklet.title,
    	 isv: true
    })
    booklet.chapterList.forEach((chapter) => {
    	 let sign = java.md5Encode(`BookID=${$.data.id}&UserID=${uid}&chapter_id=${chapter.id}&isDevice=Android&isMarket=true&regDevice=2&key=87ac02d392a8d3566fe7748c8de00af3&secrect=57dcuidu8aa8062bfe8042ea65310669`).toString().toUpperCase()
    	 let data = JSON.stringify({
    	   BookID: $.data.id,
    	   UserID: uid,
    	   chapter_id: chapter.id,
    	   isDevice: "Android",
    	   isMarket:"true",
    	   regDevice: "2",
    	   sign: sign
    	 })
      let op = JSON.stringify({
        method: "POST",
        body: data
      })
      array.push({
        name: chapter.title,
        url: "https://api.shaoniandream.com/Booklibrary/readchapter," + op,
        time: java.timeFormat(chapter.release_time_now * 1000),
        vip: chapter.isFree == 1,
        buy: chapter.lock == 1
      })
    })
  })
  array
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
  //showjname设置章节名显示卷名true or false
  let obj = {showjname: false}
  let $ = JSON.parse(String(result))
  let array = []
  $.volumes.forEach((booklet) => {
  	  java.put('jname',booklet.name)
    array.push({ 
    	    name:'◆◇'+String(booklet.name)+'◇◆',
    	    voltype:true
    	 })
    booklet.chapters.forEach((chapter) => {
href='http://api.ieasou.com/api/bookapp/chargeChapter.m?a=1&autoBuy=0&cid=eef_easou_book&version=002&os=android&udid=1c5b2618a57a0848e2510649dc1e03896f462284&appverion=1122&ch=blf1298_12337_001&session_id=-nEvkqSq_9ZyORN5OoVOOzJ&dzh=1&scp=0&appid=10001&utype=0&rtype=3&pushid=f97b7f81a269472c07708277b7c40b4f&ptype=5&gender=0&userInitPay=3&birt=1658424532472&instime=1658424529924&instId=1658424529924&chType=3&bidType=0&recSw=1&appType=0&gid='+java.get('gid')+'&nid='+chapter.nid+'&sort='+chapter.sort+'&gsort=0&sgsort=0&sequence=4&chapter_name='+chapter.chapter_name
      array.push({
        name: !java.get('jname')?chapter.chapter_name:((obj.showjname?'※'+java.get('jname')+'※ ':'').padStart(3,''))+chapter.chapter_name,
        url: href,
        time:"本章字数:"+String(chapter.wordCount)+"字",
        voltype:false
      })
    })
  })
  array
</js>

loginUrl:
<js>
function login(){
userInfo=source.getLoginInfoMap()
java.log(userInfo)
UNE=userInfo['手机号码/邮箱号']
PWD=userInfo['密码']
url="{{source.getKey()}}/api/passport/login,";
SU=source.getKey()
body={
  "account": String(UNE),
  "password": String(PWD),
  "mp_token": -1
}
option={
'method': 'POST',
'body': JSON.stringify(body)
}

url=url+JSON.stringify(option)
token=java.ajax(url).match(/"auth_token":"([^"]+)"/)[1]

Cookie={
	"Cookie":"auth_token="+token
	}
header = JSON.stringify(Cookie)
source.putLoginHeader(header)
}
</js>

ruleContent.content: if(baseUrl.match(/album-info/)){ text="↓复制下面网址，在书架选择◎添加网址◎，粘贴网址，即可阅读本书↓\n"+baseUrl+"\n简介："+JSON.parse(result).data.album.content }else if(baseUrl.match(/post_id/)){ json=JSON.parse(result) pics=json.data.post.pics; video=json.data.post.video?"视频链接："+json.data.post.video:"" preview_text=json.data.post.preview_text?json.data.post.preview_text:"" imgs=""; for(i in pics){ imgs+='\n' } result=json.data.post.content+imgs+video; result!=""?result:preview_text+"\n💰"+json.data.post.min_price+"\n"+json.data.post.has_right_errMsg }else{ result="↓↓复制下面文字，编辑书源，添加至发现规则↓↓\n"+book.name+"的作品集::"+baseUrl.replace(/page=1/,'page={\{page}}') } ##class="fr-fic fr-dib".*?"\[object Object\]"

}

1.编辑书源添加自己的账号信息，找到目录列表规则，按提示添加账号信息
2.如果添加了账号信息仍然无法获取内容，请尝试刷新或更新账号信息（方式二）
3.必要说明：如果使用方式一添加了账号信息，每次打开新的书籍详情页或刷新正文都会重新获取账号信息，因此之前获取的书籍正文的链接将会失效，因此建议全文下载或者按2操作
必要说明：在使用本源前，请考虑到使用本源可能造成的账号封禁等问题'

searchUrl:
<js>
//md5加密开始
var rotateLeft = function(lValue, iShiftBits) {
    return (lValue << iShiftBits) | (lValue >>> (32 - iShiftBits))
}
var addUnsigned = function(lX, lY) {
    var lX4, lY4, lX8, lY8, lResult;
    lX8 = (lX & 0x80000000);
    lY8 = (lY & 0x80000000);
    lX4 = (lX & 0x40000000);
    lY4 = (lY & 0x40000000);
    lResult = (lX & 0x3FFFFFFF) + (lY & 0x3FFFFFFF);
    if (lX4 & lY4) return (lResult ^ 0x80000000 ^ lX8 ^ lY8);
    if (lX4 | lY4) {
        if (lResult & 0x40000000) return (lResult ^ 0xC0000000 ^ lX8 ^ lY8);
        else return (lResult ^ 0x40000000 ^ lX8 ^ lY8)
    } else {
        return (lResult ^ lX8 ^ lY8)
    }
}
var F = function(x, y, z) {
    return (x & y) | ((~x) & z)
}
var G = function(x, y, z) {
    return (x & z) | (y & (~z))
}
var H = function(x, y, z) {
    return (x ^ y ^ z)
}
var I = function(x, y, z) {
    return (y ^ (x | (~z)))
}
var FF = function(a, b, c, d, x, s, ac) {
    a = addUnsigned(a, addUnsigned(addUnsigned(F(b, c, d), x), ac));
    return addUnsigned(rotateLeft(a, s), b)
};
var GG = function(a, b, c, d, x, s, ac) {
    a = addUnsigned(a, addUnsigned(addUnsigned(G(b, c, d), x), ac));
    return addUnsigned(rotateLeft(a, s), b)
};
var HH = function(a, b, c, d, x, s, ac) {
    a = addUnsigned(a, addUnsigned(addUnsigned(H(b, c, d), x), ac));
    return addUnsigned(rotateLeft(a, s), b)
};
var II = function(a, b, c, d, x, s, ac) {
    a = addUnsigned(a, addUnsigned(addUnsigned(I(b, c, d), x), ac));
    return addUnsigned(rotateLeft(a, s), b)
};
var convertToWordArray = function(string) {
    var lWordCount;
    var lMessageLength = string.length;
    var lNumberOfWordsTempOne = lMessageLength + 8;
    var lNumberOfWordsTempTwo = (lNumberOfWordsTempOne - (lNumberOfWordsTempOne % 64)) / 64;
    var lNumberOfWords = (lNumberOfWordsTempTwo + 1) * 16;
    var lWordArray = Array(lNumberOfWords - 1);
    var lBytePosition = 0;
    var lByteCount = 0;
    while (lByteCount < lMessageLength) {
        lWordCount = (lByteCount - (lByteCount % 4)) / 4;
        lBytePosition = (lByteCount % 4) * 8;
        lWordArray[lWordCount] = (lWordArray[lWordCount] | (string.charCodeAt(lByteCount) << lBytePosition));
        lByteCount++
    }
    lWordCount = (lByteCount - (lByteCount % 4)) / 4;
    lBytePosition = (lByteCount % 4) * 8;
    lWordArray[lWordCount] = lWordArray[lWordCount] | (0x80 << lBytePosition);
    lWordArray[lNumberOfWords - 2] = lMessageLength << 3;
    lWordArray[lNumberOfWords - 1] = lMessageLength >>> 29;
    return lWordArray
};
var wordToHex = function(lValue) {
    var WordToHexValue = "",
    WordToHexValueTemp = "",
    lByte, lCount;
    for (lCount = 0; lCount <= 3; lCount++) {
        lByte = (lValue >>> (lCount * 8)) & 255;
        WordToHexValueTemp = "0" + lByte.toString(16);
        WordToHexValue = WordToHexValue + WordToHexValueTemp.substr(WordToHexValueTemp.length - 2, 2)
    }
    return WordToHexValue
};
var uTF8Encode = function(string) {

}
}
result=JSON.stringify(Json)
</js>

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

loginUrl:
<js>
function browserLogin() {
  try {
    java.startBrowserAwait(
      "https://qidian.com", 
      "登录"
    )
  } catch (e) {}
  let ywkey = cookie.getKey("qidian.com", "ywkey")
  let ywguid = cookie.getKey("qidian.com", "ywguid")
  java.toast(ywkey)
  cookie.removeCookie("qidian.com")
  let uInfo = java.ajax("https://qqapp.qidian.com/ajax/bookShelf/list?pageNum=1&pageSize=20&_csrfToken=," + JSON.stringify({
    headers: {
      'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 8.1.0; MI PAD 4 Build/OPM1.171019.019; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/90.0.4430.226 KsWebView/1.8.90.612 (rel) Safari/537.36 NetType/wifi Language/zh miniProgram/1.60.0 KUAISHOU/11.5.30.31599 aegon/3.32.2',
      Connection: 'Keep-Alive',
      platformType: 'android',
      Referer: 'https://miniapi.ksapisrv.com/',
      'content-type': 'application/json',
      Cookie: `ywguid=${ywguid}; ywkey=${ywkey}`
    }
  }))
  uInfo = JSON.parse(uInfo)
  putLoginHeader({
      guid: ywguid,
      key: ywkey,
      uid: uInfo.data.user.userId
  })
}

function login() {}

function tokenLogin() {
  if (source.getLoginInfoMap() == null) {
    java.toast("未获取到LoginInfoMap，请尝试重新打开登录UI再按一遍")
  }
  let ywguid = source.getLoginInfoMap()["ywguid"]
  let ywkey = source.getLoginInfoMap()["ywkey"]
  let uInfo = java.ajax("https://qqapp.qidian.com/ajax/bookShelf/list?pageNum=1&pageSize=20&_csrfToken=," + JSON.stringify({
    headers: {
      'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 8.1.0; MI PAD 4 Build/OPM1.171019.019; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/90.0.4430.226 KsWebView/1.8.90.612 (rel) Safari/537.36 NetType/wifi Language/zh miniProgram/1.60.0 KUAISHOU/11.5.30.31599 aegon/3.32.2',
      Connection: 'Keep-Alive',
      platformType: 'android',
      Referer: 'https://miniapi.ksapisrv.com/',
      'content-type': 'application/json',
      Cookie: `ywguid=${ywguid}; ywkey=${ywkey}`
    }
  }))
  uInfo = JSON.parse(uInfo)
  putLoginHeader({
    guid: ywguid,
    key: ywkey,
    uid: uInfo.data.user.userId
  })
  cookie.removeCookie("qidian.com")
  java.toast("凭据保存成功")
}

function fixInformation() {
  let h = getLoginHeader()
  if (!Packages.android.text.TextUtils.isEmpty(h.uid)) {
    java.toast("您的登录信息是完整的，不需要补全")
    return
  }
  let ywkey = h.key
  let ywguid = h.guid
  let uInfo = java.ajax("https://qqapp.qidian.com/ajax/bookShelf/list?pageNum=1&pageSize=20&_csrfToken=," + JSON.stringify({
    headers: {
      'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 8.1.0; MI PAD 4 Build/OPM1.171019.019; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/90.0.4430.226 KsWebView/1.8.90.612 (rel) Safari/537.36 NetType/wifi Language/zh miniProgram/1.60.0 KUAISHOU/11.5.30.31599 aegon/3.32.2',
      Connection: 'Keep-Alive',
      platformType: 'android',
      Referer: 'https://miniapi.ksapisrv.com/',
      'content-type': 'application/json',
      Cookie: `ywguid=${ywguid}; ywkey=${ywkey}`
    }
  }))
  uInfo = JSON.parse(uInfo)
  putLoginHeader({
    guid: ywguid,
    key: ywkey,
    uid: uInfo.data.user.userId
  })
  java.toast("成功")
  cookie.removeCookie("qidian.com")
}

function proxyExcWrapper(fun) {
  try {
    fun()
  } catch (e) {
    java.log(e.toString() + e.stack)
  }
}

function tutorial() {
  java.toast("如果你是群里原书源用户，请点一下获取信息")
}

}

]))

<js>

//第一种方法
url="http:"+result.match(/<script>initTxt\(\"([^\s]+)\",/)[1];
result = java.ajax(url);
con=result.match(/"content":"([\S\s]+)","replace"/)[1];
rep =result.match(/"replace":\{([\S\s]+)\}\}\)/)[1];
con_=String(JSON.stringify(con));
Aaa=rep.replace(/"/g,"");
rep_=String(JSON.stringify(Aaa)).replace(/"/g,"");
BBB=rep_.split(",");

for(let i=0;i<BBB.length;i++)
{
	CCC=BBB[i].split(":");
	java.log(CCC[0]+"----"+CCC[1]);
	while(con_.indexOf(CCC[1])!=-1){
	con_=con_.replace(CCC[1],CCC[0]);
		}
}
result=con_.replace(/\\\\n/g,"\<br\>");

/*

//第二种方法
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)/)[1];
var json=java.ajax(url);
//java.log(json);
if (json != null) {
            json = eval("(" + String(json).replace("_txt_call(", "").replace(/[;\)]+$/, "") + ")");
            //java.log(JSON.stringify(json));
            for (let key in json.replace) {
                let i = new RegExp(json.replace[key], "ig");
                json.content = json.content.replace(i, key)
            }
            result = json.content;
        }

*/
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
@js:
var tt=result
java.put("str",tt)
java.setContent(tt,"https://www.tenghuxs.com/")
let lis=java.getElements('class.BCsectionTwo-top@tag.li')
let list=[]
num=parseInt(java.get("num"))
for(var i=0;i<lis.length;i++){
	
java.setContent(lis[i],"https://www.tenghuxs.com/")
	ss=java.getElement('tag.a')
	
	str='{"name": "第'+String(num)+'章 '+ss.text()+'","href":"'+ss.attr("href")+'"}'
	list.push(str)
	num=num+1
	}
	java.put("num",num)
list

ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

ruleBookInfo.author: [property$=author]@content

ruleContent.content:
<js>
try {

function d(a, b) {
b = java.md5Encode(b);
var d = b.substring(0, 16);
var e = b.substring(16);
return java.aesBase64DecodeToString(a,e,"AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding",d)
}

result=eval(src.match(/(d\("[\s\S]+"\))\);/)[1])
} catch(err) {

result=result
}

a=escape(result).replace(/%u200[ABDCEF]/g,"")
unescape(a)

</js>

.replace("••","")

.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {

				}

@js:
u="https://m.hjbook.com/search.php?keyword=submit="
loc=java.get(u,{})
lo=String(loc.headers("location"||"Location")).replace(/\[(.*)\]/,"$1")
code=loc.statusCode()
if(code>=301){
uu=source.key+lo
java.log(uu)
re=java.ajax(uu)
java.log(uu)
na=re.match(/" name="(.*)" v/)[1]
va=re.match(/value="(.*)"\/\>/)[1]
no=re.match(/bute\("value","(.*)"\),d/)[1]
bd=`${na}=${va}&nonce=${no}`
java.log(bd)
url=source.key+"/search.php?keyword={{key}}&submit=,"+JSON.stringify({
  "body": bd,
  "method": "POST",
    	})}else{url=source.key+"/search.php?keyword={{key}}&submit="}

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var bes = result.match(/PHA\+[A-Za-z0-9+\/]+={0,2}/g);
//java.log(String(bes))
if (!bes) {
    var ml = java.webView(null,baseUrl,null);
    var txt = java.getString("#novelcontent@html");
    java.longToast("正文解密失败，转为webView动态加载。");
} else {
var result = [];
for (var i = 0; i < bes.length; i++) {
    // 遍历数组，使用阅读内置Base64解码方法
    var bsej = java.base64Decode(bes[i]);
    var txtt = String(bsej);
    result.push(txtt);
      }
	var txt = result.join('\n');
}
txt;
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
//获取真实正文地址
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
//获取正文内容
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者内容正在手打中，请换源或稍后访问~"}
</js>

ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content}}･{{@@[property$=update_time]@content##\s.*}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

<js>
const res = java.connect(`${baseUrl}/sort/`);
var regex = /<li><a href="(\/sort\/\d+_\d+\/)">([^<]+)<\/a><span>共 (\d+) 本<\/span><\/li>/g;
const html = res.body();

const categories = [];
let match;
while ((match = regex.exec(html)) != null) {
  java.log(match[2])
  categories.push({
    url: match[1],
    title: match[2],
    count: parseInt(match[3], 10)
  });
}

JSON.stringify(categories);
</js>

ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3
ruleBookInfo.name: [property$=book_name]@content
ruleBookInfo.author: [property$=author]@content

ruleContent.replaceRegex: ##喜欢.*{{book.name}}.*|尊贵特权，.*|小主，.*|这章.*|本小章.*

{{@@[name$=chapter_name]@content}}･{{@@[name$=update_time]@content##T.*}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

ruleContent.content:
<js>
function d(a, b) {
            b = CryptoJS.MD5(b).toString();
            var d = CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.parse(b.substring(0, 16));
            var e = CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.parse(b.substring(16));
            return CryptoJS.AES.decrypt(a, e, { iv: d, padding: CryptoJS.pad.Pkcs7 }).toString(CryptoJS.enc.Utf8)
        }
match=src.match(/\.html\((d.*?"\))/);
//java.log(match[1])
if(match){
result=eval(match[1])}else result
</js>

function x(a, b) { result = String(result).replace(a, b); } //debug function d(debug) { java.log(debug); java.log(result); } //同时加载多章时，自动验证成功后有的页面加载失败时重新获取 if(/.*1234/.test(src)){ //重新设置正文解析内容 java.setContent(java.ajax(baseUrl)); } //获取正文内容 result = java.getString('.neirong@html'); //大概第四页正文有切割，需要调接口获取这一页剩余正文 if (/\$.post\('',{'j':'1'}/.test(src)) { result += java.ajax(String(baseUrl + ',' + JSON.stringify({ "method": "POST", "body": "j=1" }))) } //d("正文"+baseUrl) //有问题修改下面正则 两个br标签换行显示 x(/((\s*)
\n?){2}/g,"

"); x(//g,""); try { // Aes解密 secret = src.match(/=\s*secret\(\s*['"](.+?)['"],[\s]*['"](.+?)['"],[^);]*?/); string = secret[1] code = java.md5Encode(secret[2]); iv = code.substring(0, 16); key = code.substring(16); //java.log(baseUrl + " Aes解密ok：" + code + "\n" + iv + "\n" + key) result = java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/CBC/PKCS7Padding", key, iv).decryptStr(string); } catch (err) { try { // 乱序恢复 ns = java.base64Decode(src.match(/var ns='(.+?)';/)[1]).split(','); //java.log(baseUrl + "乱序恢复ok") paragraphArr = result.split('

'); result = ""; for (i = 1; i <= paragraphArr.length; i++) { result += paragraphArr[ns[i] - ns[0]] + '

'; } } catch (err) { //java.log(baseUrl + "乱序恢复Aes解密no") } } //初始化图片链接 x(/[\r\n]?[\t ]*]+>[\t ]*[\r\n]?/g, "#$1#"); //初始化字体格式的文字,匹配 x(/(.*?)<\/i>/g, function(str, p1) { //java.log(p1.charCodeAt().toString(16)); //返回16进制，例：p1= 返回格式#e800# return '#' + p1.charCodeAt().toString(16) + '#' }) //转换空格 x(/ /g, ' '); //初始化分段准备 x(/[\t  ]{2,2}/g, "　"); //去掉标签里的属性 x(/(\<|<)([^\>]*?)(\s| )[^\>]*(\>|>)/g, "<$2>"); //段落换行 x(/\s*(\n|)+\s*(　{2,})?/gi, "\r\n"); //去掉不需要的标签 x(/([\r\n　]*\<\/?([A-Za-z]*)?\>[\r\n　]*)/gi, ""); //引号替换 x(/‘/g, "『"); x(/’/g, "』"); x(/“/g, "「"); x(/”/g, "」"); if (/(Undefined|(^\s*$))/.test(result)) { result = "
　　网站分页有时有问题不可用，速度慢的时候就会是现在这样了，网站速度快的时候就没事了。
　　换个时间刷新试试！！！

　　换个时间刷新试试！！！
" + result; } //d("正文"+baseUrl) "\r\n" + result + "hereispagebreak";

header:
<js>
(() => {
	try {
		data = JSON.parse(source.getVariable())
	} catch (err) {
		data = {}
	}
	sessionID = data.sessionID||"";
	if (!sessionID) {
		chars = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz123456789";
		charsLength = chars.length
		for (i = 0; i < 26; i++) {
			sessionID += chars.charAt(Math.floor(Math.random() * charsLength))
		}
		data.sessionID = sessionID
		source.setVariable(JSON.stringify(data))
	}
	return JSON.stringify({
		"cookie": "PHPSESSID=" + sessionID,
		"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 13_3_1 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/605.1.15 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/13.0.5 Mobile/15E148 Snapchat/10.77.5.59 (like Safari/604.1)"
	})
})()
</js>

ruleToc.chapterName:
{{@@tag.a@text}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

<js>
cookie.removeCookie(source.key);
url=source.key;
a=java.ajax(url);
b=a.match(/action=\"([^"]*)\"/)[1];
c=`?searchkey=${key},{"method": "post"}`;
b+=c
</js>

@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

                json.content = json.content.replace(i, key)

            result = json.content

\n?){2}/g,"

header:
<js>
(() => {
	try {
		data = JSON.parse(source.getVariable())
	} catch (err) {
		data = {}
	}
	sessionID = data.sessionID||"";
	if (!sessionID) {
		chars = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz123456789";
		charsLength = chars.length
		for (i = 0; i < 26; i++) {
			sessionID += chars.charAt(Math.floor(Math.random() * charsLength))
		}
		data.sessionID = sessionID
		source.setVariable(JSON.stringify(data))
	}
	return JSON.stringify({
		"cookie": "PHPSESSID=" + sessionID,
		"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 13_3_1 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/605.1.15 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/13.0.5 Mobile/15E148 Snapchat/10.77.5.59 (like Safari/604.1)"
	})
})()
</js>

.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')

.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')

.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

bookSourceComment:
◎只看楼主：
在设置源变量（该源所有书应用）或者设置书籍变量（只有本书应用）里填上『只看楼主』则只会显示楼主内容
❗️注意：楼主如果是『匿名青花鱼』改规则会导致无正文内容，请删除设置变量里的《只看楼主》
做完更改后都需要刷新，正文如果缓存了也需要刷新，或者清除缓存

	}else{

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var bes = result.match(/PHA\+[A-Za-z0-9+\/]+={0,2}/g);
//java.log(String(bes))
if (!bes) {
    var ml = java.webView(null,baseUrl,null);
    var txt = java.getString("#txt@html");
    java.longToast("正文解密失败，转为webView动态加载。");
} else {
var result = [];
for (var i = 0; i < bes.length; i++) {
    // 遍历数组，使用阅读内置Base64解码方法
    var bsej = java.base64Decode(bes[i]);
    var txtt = String(bsej);
    result.push(txtt);
      }
	var txt = result.join('\n');
}
txt;
</js>##全本小说网.*最新章节！|uu看书.*com|请记住本书首发域名\：\。|手机版更新最快网址：|天才壹秒.*網.*

ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content}}･{{@@[property$=update_time]@content##\s.*}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var bes = result.match(/PHA\+[A-Za-z0-9+\/]+={0,2}/g);
//java.log(String(bes))
if (!bes) {
    var ml = java.webView(null,baseUrl,null);
    var txt = java.getString("#novelcontent@html");
    java.longToast("正文解密失败，转为webView动态加载。");
} else {
var result = [];
for (var i = 0; i < bes.length; i++) {
    // 遍历数组，使用阅读内置Base64解码方法
    var bsej = java.base64Decode(bes[i]);
    var txtt = String(bsej);
    result.push(txtt);
      }
	var txt = result.join('\n');
}
txt;
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
discover = [];
push = (title, url, style) => discover.push({ title: title, url: url, style: { layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: style } });
addSlots = (count, style) => {
    remainder = count % 3;
    slotsAdd = remainder === 0 ? 0 : 3 - remainder;
    for (i = 0; i < slotsAdd; i++) {
        push("", null, style);
    }
};
push("收藏夹", null, 1);
try {
    favored = java.ajax(`${baseUrl}/api/user/favored`);
    if (favored.includes("Token不合法或者过期")) {
        push("账号未登录", null, 0.25);
        addSlots(1, 0.25);
    } else {
        favoredData = JSON.parse(favored).favoredWeb;
        favoredData.forEach(item => {
            push(item.title, `/api/user/favored-web/${item.id}?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=30&sort=update`, 0.25);
        });
        addSlots(favoredData.length, 0.25);
    }
} catch (e) {
    push("未知错误", null, 0.25);
    addSlots(1, 0.25);
};
push("来源", null, 1);
providers = ["全部", "kakuyomu", "syosetu", "novelup", "hameln", "pixiv", "alphapolis"];
providers.forEach(provider => {
    url = provider === "全部" ? 
        `/api/novel?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=20&query=&provider=${providers.slice(1).join('%2C')}&type=0&level=0&translate=0&sort=0` : 
        `/api/novel?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=20&query=&provider=${provider}&type=0&level=0&translate=0&sort=0`;
    push(provider, url, 0.25);
});
addSlots(providers.length, 0.25);
push("类型", null, 1);
types = ["全部", "连载中", "已完结", "短篇"];
types.forEach((type, index) => {
    url = `/api/novel?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=20&query=&provider=kakuyomu%2Csyosetu%2Cnovelup%2Chameln%2Cpixiv%2Calphapolis&type=${index}&level=0&translate=0&sort=0`;
    push(type, url, 0.25);
});
addSlots(types.length, 0.25);
push("排序", null, 1);
sorts = ["更新", "点击"];
sorts.forEach((sort, index) => {
    url = `/api/novel?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=20&query=&provider=kakuyomu%2Csyosetu%2Cnovelup%2Chameln%2Cpixiv%2Calphapolis&type=0&level=0&translate=0&sort=${index}`;
    push(sort, url, 0.25);
});
addSlots(sorts.length, 0.25);
JSON.stringify(discover);
</js>
loginUrl:
<js>
function login() {
    username = source.getLoginInfoMap().get("账号");
    password = source.getLoginInfoMap().get("密码");
    url = `${baseUrl}/api/auth/sign-in`;
    body = JSON.stringify({
        emailOrUsername: username,
        password: password
    });
    headers = {
        "Content-Type": "application/json"
    };
    response = java.post(url, body, headers);
    responseBody = response.body();
    authorizationObject = {
        Authorization: `Bearer ${responseBody}`
    };
    header = JSON.stringify(authorizationObject);
    source.putLoginHeader(header);
}
login();
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
initUrl = book.bookUrl;
url = initUrl.includes('api/novel') ? initUrl : initUrl.replace('novel', 'api/novel');
body = initUrl.includes('api/novel') ? result : java.ajax(url);
if (body.includes('ID不合适，应当使用')) {
    match = body.match(/\/\w+\/[\w-]+/);
    url = `${book.origin}/api/novel${match}`;
    body = java.ajax(url);
}
if (body.includes("Token不合法或者过期")) {
    java.toast("当前会话已失效，请重新登录");
}
java.put('url', url);
body
</js>

ruleContent.content: value = String(book.getVariable("custom")) || String(source.getVariable()); get = (value >= '1' && value <= '9') ? value : '1'; config = { 1: 'sakuraParagraphs', 2: 'gptParagraphs', 3: 'youdaoParagraphs', 4: 'baiduParagraphs', 5: 'paragraphs' }; result = JSON.parse(result); content = result[config[get]] || result[config[2]] || result[config[3]] || result[config[4]] || result[config[5]]; if (['6', '7', '8', '9'].includes(get)) { type = ['6', '8'].includes(get); jpContent = result[config[5]]; cnContent = result[config[1]] || result[config[2]] || result[config[3]] || result[config[4]]; if (cnContent) { content = jpContent.flatMap((jp, i) => (type ? [cnContent[i], jp] : [jp, cnContent[i]])).filter(Boolean); } else { content = jpContent; } }; regex = content => { displayedImages = new Set(); return JSON.stringify(content).replace(/<图片>(https?:\/\/[^"\s]+)/g, (_, p1) => { if (displayedImages.has(p1)) return ''; displayedImages.add(p1); return ''; }); }; format = content => content.replace(/^\[|\]$/g, '').split(',').map(item => item.trim().replace(/^"|"$/g, '')).filter(Boolean).map((item, i) => item.startsWith('{"headers"') && i > 0 ? ',' + item : ' ' + item).join("\n"); format(regex(content));

searchUrl:
<js>
providers = {
    kakuyomu: /(?:https?:\/\/)?kakuyomu\.jp\/works\/(\d+)/,
    syosetu: /(?:https?:\/\/)?(ncode|novel18)\.syosetu\.com\/(\w+)/,
    novelup: /(?:https?:\/\/)?novelup\.plus\/story\/(\d+)/,
    hameln: /(?:https?:\/\/)?syosetu\.org\/novel\/(\d+)/,
    pixiv: /(?:https?:\/\/)?(www\.pixiv\.net\/novel\/series\/(\d+)|www\.pixiv\.net\/novel\/show\.php\?id=(\d+))/,
    alphapolis: /(?:https?:\/\/)?www\.alphapolis\.co\.jp\/novel\/(\d+)\/(\d+)/,
    sakura: /(?:https?:\/\/)?books\d?\.fishhawk\.top\/(?:api\/)?novel\/(\w+)\/([\w-]+)/
};
for (provider in providers) {
    match = key.match(providers[provider]);
    if (match) {
        providerId = provider === 'sakura' ? match[1] : provider;
        novelId = provider === 'alphapolis' ? `${match[1]}-${match[2]}` : provider === 'pixiv' ? (match[3] ? `s${match[3]}` : match[2]) : (match[2] || match[1]);
        url = `${baseUrl}/api/novel/${providerId}/${novelId}`;
        break;
    } else {
        url = `${baseUrl}/api/novel?page=${page-1}&pageSize=20&query=${key}&provider=kakuyomu,syosetu,novelup,hameln,pixiv,alphapolis&type=0&level=0&translate=0&sort=1`;
    }
    url
}
</js>

variableComment: 输入对应数字刷新即可获取对应文本，{1: "sakura译文", 2: "gpt译文", 3: "有道译文", 4: "百度译文", 5: "原文", 6: "中日", 7: "日中", 8: "5+6", 9: "5+7"}，默认sakura译文。书籍变量作用于一本书，源变量作用于整个书源，书籍变量优先级高于源变量。

var e = b.substring(16);
return java.aesBase64DecodeToString(a,e,"AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding",d)
}

result=eval(src.match(/(d\("[\s\S]+"\))\);/)[1])
} catch(err) {

result=result
}

a=escape(result).replace(/%u200[ABDCEF]/g,"")
unescape(a)

</js>

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
function getBookIdFull(url) {
	const {java} = this
	$ = JSON.parse(url).data
	if ($.book_shelf_info != 0 && $.book_shelf_info != undefined) {
		arr = $.book_shelf_info.map($ => $.book_id)
	} else if (list = $.data_list != 0 && $.data_list != undefined)  {
		arr = $.data_list.map($ => $.book_id_str)
	} else {
		java.toast("获取 book_id 失败，你可能需要登录！")
	}
	return arr
}
let ck = "sessionid=" + (String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid")) ? String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid")) : (source.getLoginInfoMap() ? source.getLoginInfoMap() : {})['手动登录Token'])

getShelf = () => {
let book_shelf_url = 'https://fanqienovel.com/reading/bookapi/bookshelf/info/v:version/?aid=1967&iid=0&version_code=57700&update_version_code=57700'
let book_shelf_info = java.ajax(book_shelf_url + ', ' + JSON.stringify({
  headers: {
    'Cookie': ck
  }
}))

bid = getBookIdFull(book_shelf_info)
let id_list = splitArray(bid, 100)
let urls = []
id_list.forEach(i => {
    urls.push(source.bookSourceUrl + "/multi-detail?book_id=" + i.join(","))
})

res = java.ajaxAll(urls)

let resp = {book_info: []}
res.forEach(r => {
  resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(r.body()).data)
})

return resp
}

function getByGroupName(name) {
  let book_shelf_url = 'https://fanqienovel.com/reading/bookapi/bookshelf/info/v:version/?aid=1967&iid=0&version_code=57700&update_version_code=57700'

  let book_shelf_info = JSON.parse(java.ajax(book_shelf_url + ', ' + JSON.stringify({
    headers: {
      'Cookie': ck,
    }
  })))
  let group_bookids = {
    "未分组": []
  }
  // java.log(
  book_shelf_info.data.book_shelf_info.forEach(i => {
    if (!group_bookids[i.group_name ? i.group_name : "未分组"]) group_bookids[i.group_name] = []
    group_bookids[i.group_name ? i.group_name : "未分组"].push(i.book_id)
  })
  // java.log(JSON.stringify(group_bookids["未分组"]))
  // java.log(decodeURIComponent(name))
  if (!group_bookids[decodeURIComponent(name)]) return {data: []}
  //java.log("awa")
  let book_ids = splitArray(group_bookids[decodeURIComponent(name)], 100)
  let urls = []

  book_ids.forEach(i => {
    urls.push(source.bookSourceUrl + "/multi-detail?book_id=" + i.join(","))
  })
  
  res = java.ajaxAll(urls)

  let resp = {book_info: []}
  res.forEach(r => {
    resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(r.body()).data)
  })

  return resp
}

function getByTabIndex(index) {
  let url = _mlsec.requestHeader(
	  "bookmall/tab",
    "version_name=5.8.9.32",
	  null,
	  ck
  )
  let all = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url))
  let tab = all.data.tab_item[0].cell_data[index].cell_data
  if (!tab) tab = []
  let bookList = []
  for (let i of tab) {
    bookList = bookList.concat(i.book_data)
    // java.log(JSON.stringify(i.book_data))
  }
  return { book_info: bookList }
}

if (baseUrl.endsWith("bookshelf")) result = getShelf("bookshelf/info")
else {
  let w = baseUrl.split("/")
  if (baseUrl.includes("groupName")) {
    result = getByGroupName(w[w.length - 1])
  } else if (baseUrl.includes("tab")) {
    result = getByTabIndex(parseInt(w[w.length - 1]))
  } else result = JSON.parse(result)
}
JSON.stringify({data: result.book_info || result.data.book_info || result.detail_list || result.data})
</js>

@js:result

.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

ruleContent.content:
<js>
try {

function d(a, b) {
b = java.md5Encode(b);
var d = b.substring(0, 16);
var e = b.substring(16);
return java.aesBase64DecodeToString(a,e,"AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding",d)
}

result=eval(src.match(/(d\("[\s\S]+"\))\);/)[1])
} catch(err) {

result=result
}

a=escape(result).replace(/%u200[ABDCEF]/g,"")
unescape(a)

</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
temp=result
R=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(temp).select(".BCsectionTwo-top-chapter a")
c=[]
R.forEach(r=>{
	i=String(r.attr('href')).replace(/.+\/\d+\/(\d+)\.html/,`$1`)
	//java.log(i)
	c.push({
		name:r.text(),
		url:r.attr('href'),
		index:i
		})
	})
try{
	o=temp.match(/originalOrder[^=]*=[^\[]*\[([^\]]+)\]/)[1]
	o=o.split(",")
	c.sort((a,b)=>o[c.indexOf(a)]-o[c.indexOf(b)])
	}catch (err){
		java.log(err)
		c.sort((a,b)=>a.index-b.index)
		}
	result=c
</js>

<js>
try {

function d(a, b) {
b = java.md5Encode(b);
var d = b.substring(0, 16);
var e = b.substring(16);
return java.aesBase64DecodeToString(a,e,"AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding",d)
}

result=eval(src.match(/(d\("[\s\S]+"\))\);/)[1])
} catch(err) {

result=result
}

a=escape(result).replace(/%u200[ABDCEF]/g,"")
unescape(a)

</js>

text=text+'【'+i+'】'+list[i].html()+'\n';
}

<js>
match=result.match(/d\(".+"[^"]+".+"\)/)
function d(a, b){
	b = java.md5Encode(b)
	iv = b.substring(0, 16)
	key = b.substring(16)
	Cipher=java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/CBC/PKCS7Padding" ,key,iv)
	return Cipher.decryptStr(a)}
eval(match[0])
</js>

bookSourceComment: 有时候网站会报错 502 导致书源请求失败，暂不清楚是网站限制访问频率，还是单纯的网站后端问题，我尝试加上遇到 502 就自动重试一次，发现还是直接 502，所以也没啥好办法，建议遇到搜索/发现/详情/目录/正文为空时，可以重试一次（目录/正文则是再 刷新 一次）

ruleContent.content:
<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者内容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍访问或者联系管理员更新~"}
</js>

</js>

<js>
var bookId=java.get('bid');
var encryptKey="37e81a9d8f02596e1b895d07c171d5c9",user_id="8000000",timestamp=parseInt((new Date).getTime()/1e3);
var o=bookId+timestamp+user_id+encryptKey;
var sign=java.md5Encode(o);
var list={'turl':'https://ocean.shuqireader.com/api/bcspub/qswebapi/book/chapterlist?_=&bookId='+bookId+'&user_id=8000000&sign='+sign+'&timestamp='+timestamp};list
</js>

bookSourceComment:
该书源正文被分成了几页，导致一些句子被中间截断，我做了一些处理，对于这种：
"他轻轻咳嗽了
两声，提醒了一下。"
样子被截断的句子（也就是截断处的末尾是一个 汉字 或 阿拉伯数字 而非标点符号之类的），书源会将其拼合起来，并且为了避免误伤，我也做了特殊处理，书源会使用 "㏒" 符号来标记分页处（我专门找了个这种在网络小说界及其冷门的小众符号，避免误伤），书源只会检查分页处有该符号的文字是否被截断。
备用地址：https://sma.yueyouxs.com
